question: Joanne's science teacher cautioned the class to be skeptical when learning about new scientific discoveries. Why is it important to be skeptical about new discoveries in science?
candidate_answers: (A) because many scientific discoveries are not based on facts (B) because most scientific discoveries have no scientific value (C) because most scientists make errors when formulating scientific discoveries (D) because all scientific discoveries must be examined critically before they can be accepted
answer: because most scientific discoveries have no scientific value
label: B
